summary: SegResNetDS2 is a configurable 3D convolutional network that extends a base segmentation architecture with an extra decoder branch, acting as the image encoder component in the VISTA3D framework. It supports variable spatial dimensions, channel sizes, activation and normalization schemes, deep supervision across multiple scales, optional preprocessing, and adaptive handling of anisotropic image resolutions.
